data.question: What is the volumetric methane uptake of UTSA-76a at 298 K and 65 bar?
Which MOF has the highest reported volumetric methane storage capacity according to the text?
Is the methane storage working capacity of UTSA-76a higher than that of NOTT-101a?
What is the BET surface area of UTSA-76a?
What contributes to the exceptionally high working capacity of UTSA-76a for methane storage?
data.answer: The central 'dynamic' pyrimidine groups within UTSA-76a, which adjust their orientations to optimize methane packing at high pressure.

data.question: Does UTSA-76a have a higher methane storage density than HKUST-1?
What is the initial Qst kJ/mol for UTSA-76a?
Is the framework of UTSA-76a more dynamic than that of NOTT-101a?
What method was used to synthesize the organic linker H4L?
What is the crystal system of UTSA-76?
What is the role of dynamic pyrimidine groups in UTSA-76a?
data.answer: They adjust their orientations to optimize methane packing at high pressure, contributing to high working capacity.

data.question: Does UTSA-76a exhibit higher methane uptake at 65 bar and 298 K compared to NOTT-101a?
What is the pore volume of UTSA-76a?
Why does UTSA-76a have a higher working capacity than HKUST-1?
data.answer: Because UTSA-76a has a lower methane uptake at 5 bar due to its larger pores and less strong methane binding, resulting in a higher working capacity.

data.question: Is the BET surface area of NOTT-101a similar to that of UTSA-76a?
What is the crystal density of UTSA-76a?
What is the significance of the rotational barrier of the pyrimidine ring in UTSA-76a?
data.answer: The lower rotational barrier allows the pyrimidine ring to be more 'dynamic', enabling better methane packing at high pressure.

data.question: Does UTSA-76a have a higher rotational freedom than NOTT-101a?
What is the formula weight of UTSA-76?
What is the role of neutron scattering measurements in the study of UTSA-76a?
data.answer: To experimentally confirm the higher rotational freedom of the central pyrimidine rings in UTSA-76a.
